ANML - Axon

Axon

Modernizing a web experience

Services
  • Strategy
  • UX
  • Visual Design
  • Development

AXON, the makers of the TASER, is on a mission to make the bullet obsolete.

ANML helped AXON clearly communicate their story across their website, while creating a design language and user experience that parallels the technology and quality of their products. From educating law enforcement agencies on the benefits of the axon ecosystem, to inspiring new employees, we’d like to think we played a small role in protecting life — through design.
